background.summary: Author, venture capitalist, and Marine veteran who served as U.S. Senator from Ohio before becoming Vice President.
highlights: Served in U.S. Marine Corps, including deployment to Iraq
Worked in venture capital in Silicon Valley

senate_record.summary: Served one term in the U.S. Senate representing Ohio, focusing on industrial policy, family policy, and tech regulation.

key_votes.note: Before taking office - ran opposing the bill
Opposed additional military aid to Ukraine
Voted against federal protection for same-sex marriage

committees: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

key_positions.stance: Supports aggressive tariffs to protect American manufacturing and workers
key_positions.quote: We need to re-industrialize America and bring back the jobs that were shipped overseas.

key_positions.stance: Advocates for breaking up Big Tech and reducing Section 230 protections
key_positions.quote: Big Tech has too much power over our speech, our data, and our democracy.

key_positions.stance: Supports expanding child tax credits and family-friendly policies
key_positions.quote: We need to make it easier for American families to have and raise children.

key_positions.stance: Skeptical of foreign interventions, opposes continued aid to Ukraine
key_positions.quote: America needs to focus on our own problems before policing the world.

key_positions.stance: Strong border security advocate, supports immigration restrictions
key_positions.quote: We must secure our border and put American workers first.
